findLocationById

public Location findLocationById(java.lang.String id)
                          throws CabinNotFoundException
Attempts to find a cabin with the provided cabinNumber in the cabin-List.

Parameters:
id - The cabinnumber of the cabin to be returned
Returns:
The first cabin in the list with the corresponding cabinnumber.
Throws:
CabinNotFoundException - If no cabin with the provided number could be found.

Tha cabin.

getMaximumPossibleIncome

public double getMaximumPossibleIncome()
Returns the maximum possible income that could be achieved. Therefore the cost for all cabins are added up.

Returns:
The added cost of all cabins.

orderLocations

public java.util.List<Location> orderLocations(java.util.List<Location> locations2,
                                               boolean byId)
Orders the present list of locations. Either by their id, or by price.

Parameters:
locations2 -
byId - True of order by id, false if order by price.

searchLocations

public java.util.List<Location> searchLocations(java.lang.String searchString,
                                                java.lang.String category)
Searches the list of location for matches with the provided parameters.

Parameters:
searchString - The string that should be matched. In case of the compared attribute being not a string, only a perfect match will return true.
category - The category specifies the compared attributes: id, price, booked, area.
Returns:
A list of the matching locations. If no search string is provided then all locations are returned.
